column4: CHANGED -- translation length changed; FAIL_NO_TRG_TR -- no projection; OK -- intact or same len translation

column3: status of the projected translation  ( when STATUS != "FAIL_NO_TRG_TR"  )
column4: OK -- intact protein sequence;  OK_TRA_LEN_SAME -- translation of the same length; TRA_CHANGED  -- translation length modifie upon projection

column3: status of the projected 5' UTR (same STATUS values)
column4: UTR_5_OK --intact 5' UTR; UTR_5_LOST -- 5' UTR was lost during projecting;  UTR_5_OK_EMPTY -- no 5' UTR for projection and source too; UTR_5_GAINED -- no 5' UTR for source an 5' UTR for projection

column3: status of the projected 3' UTR (same STATUS values)
column4: UTR_3_OK --intact 3' UTR; UTR_3_LOST -- 3' UTR was lost during projecting;  UTR_3_OK_EMPTY -- no 3' UTR for projection and source too; UTR_3_GAINED -- no 3' UTR for source an 3' UTR for projection

column3: Levenshtein-Damerau (edits with transpositions) distance between translations
Levenshtein-Damerau distance  between source and target  5' UTRs
Levenshtein-Damerau distance between source and target  3' UTRs
Levenshtein-Damerau distance between source and target spliced sequences
source translation peptide sequence (or empty if src eq trg, or one is missing)
target translation peptide sequence (or empty if src eq trg, or one is missing)
source 5' UTR nucleotide sequence (or empty if src eq trg, or one is missing)
source 3' UTR nucleotide sequence (or empty if src eq trg, or one is missing)
target 5' UTR nucleotide sequence (or empty if src eq trg, or one is missing)
target 3' UTR nucleotide sequence (or empty if src eq trg, or one is missing)
